citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm on
07/29/2015. A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection
process.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm on
07/29/2015.  A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection
process.
